qas.question: What is the name of the municipal government by which New Delhi is governed?
What government body is responsible for administering other urban areas of the metropolis of Delhi?
What is the name commonly used to refer to the entire metropolis of Delhi?
The New Delhi Municipal Government oversees what large Indian city?
What form of government is responsible for the municipality of New Delhi?

context: <a3_0>New Delhi<a3_0/> is governed through <a4_0>a municipal government<a4_0/>, known as the <a0_0>New Delhi Municipal Council (NDMC)<a0_0/>. Other urban areas of the metropolis of Delhi are administered by the <a1_0>Municipal Corporation of Delhi (MCD)<a1_0/>. However, the entire metropolis of Delhi is commonly known as <a2_0>New Delhi<a2_0/> in contrast to Old Delhi.
